(If one more of my char's get's called a bitch, I'm blowing up the 
planet. Got it? Good. Get creative, but knock off the cussing.  I 
mean, my chars don't go calling the other chars names like that. 
Battera called Vulois a creep.  KitKat refered to Megatron as a 
jerk.  Come on.  Get creative please. Thank you.)

::Battera::
She flew high and went into a cloud bank. "That inferior piece of 
Cybertrash.  He just hauled of and hit me for no reason. Huh, I 
should have let him stayed tied up."  She landed a few miles away 
from the allience base, just at the boarder of thier scanners.  She 
landed in a tree and rubbed the side of her face.  It stung and 
burned slightly. "He's so high and mighty,he's such a creep. Just hit 
a bot for no reason. And that ladyhawk feather head,royalty huh? They 
can all go to the pit. I'm tired of being pushed around. So I'm not 
royalty. So I'm not some special big hot shot from the outer limits 
or something."  SHe turned her head back towards the direction of the 
alliance base and stuck her tongue out. "FFFBBBBRRRTTT. To the 
darkest corner of the pit with you. Who needs you anyway. I don't." 
she lightly touches the mark on the side of her face. "I'll make sure 
I repay you for this."  She sat in the tree. Not realizing she was 
still in the scanner range, she hung upside down in the high branches 
of the tree.  Her wings wrapped around her and tried to conseal 
herself in the shadow.  "Yeah, who needs them anyway." She kept an 
eye out for passing bots, but would remain quiet. She was too mad to 
think correctly and decided to try to calm down before doing anything 
else.
